statements: DELETE FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Tractor' AND equipment_type = 'Harvester'
DELETE FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND equipment_type = 'Tractor';
DELETE FROM Farming_Equipment WHERE gps_latitude > 30.0 AND gps_longitude < 100.0;
DELETE FROM equipment_location WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND location_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM equipment_movement WHERE direction = 'north' AND speed > 50
DELETE FROM FarmEquipment WHERE farm_id = 2 AND equipment_id = 5;
